text: I know 2:13 yoʋr works and 87% ¦ --- CT 5.5%yoʋr works and where yoʋ dwell, where Satan's throne is. Yet yoʋ hold fast to my name, and yoʋ did not deny my 2:13 faith 91.8% ¦ faith, even ANT CT TR 8.2%faith in the days 2:13 when Antipas was 47.3% {K ANT BYZ HF 43.4%} ¦ of Antipas CT 2.7%when Antipas was my 2:13 faithful witness 85.5% ¦ witness, my faithful one NA SBL WH 2.7%faithful witness, who was killed among you, where Satan dwells.
